title: Opinion: Opinion | An India Miscalculation, And Ego: Inside Bangladesh's Costly World Cup Exit
summary_full: If the Bangladesh Cricket Board and the Bangladesh government thought that there was a genuine security threat to their players in India, why weren't these concerns raised earlier?
summary_public: If the Bangladesh Cricket Board and the Bangladesh government thought that there was a genuine security threat to their players in India, why weren't these concerns raised earlier?
